basic.floral_language:
Osmanthus delavayi 
Floriography: indifferent, chaste, glorious
Osmanthus delavayi is leafy with dark green leaf color and oblong leaf shape. Flowers are miniature in dense clusters with a sweet smell even in a far distance. Osmanthus flowers can be used to extract oil, for pastry, wine and tea, with anti-inflammatory and other cosmetics use.
Osmanthus delavayi likes sunny place, but shade properly in summer to avoid strong sunlight. Flowering from August to October 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period August-October, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Flower color orange yellow , light yellow, cream white

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, slight shade tolerance, avoid strong light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering and fertilization in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Need more fertilization, apply low concentration liquid fertilizes every 7-10 days
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered and overlong branches, trim before sprouting in winner or early spring
